name: Distant
description:
----------

Landing on a distant planet, you're tasked with repairing some drills.  You'd think it'd be a mundane task, but things get exciting when you're in space...

-----------

Distant is a first-person experience of a futuristic repairman sent to a planet to fix some drills. That's right, even in the future things still need repairing. In a very large, very desolate desolate canyon, you must drive around to various locations and fix the drills there. Be careful though, drills are very loud and like to attract some of the planet's residents. Don't stay too long, else be overwhelmed. 

Interesting soundscape immerses you in the experience.

Satisfying driving mechanics.

Proof of concept, so more content can be developed!

Controls

WASD  - movement / driving

E - interact

R - reload

LMB - shoot

L Shift - run
